rooms.description: spacious entrance hall with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, oriented towards the east to adhere to Vastu principles of positive energy flow.
Mediterranean styled living room with open plan, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, decorated with stone accents and warm earth tones; placed in the central area for optimum sunlight.
dining area adjacent to the living room, open layout with Mediterranean decorative elements, positioned towards the south to balance energy flow according to Vastu norms.
functional kitchen with modern amenities and a dedicated pantry, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural lighting; aligned to the east to promote health and prosperity in Vastu guidelines.
master bedroom on the ground floor with en-suite bathroom, private balcony featuring Mediterranean design elements; located in the northeast corner for peace and calm as per Vastu principles.
secondary bedroom designed with ample storage space and a built-in dressing area; positioned in the northwest region to ensure privacy and balance in energy flow.
guest bathroom located adjacent to the secondary bedroom for convenience.
compact living space for domestic help with a small kitchenette and storage area; positioned towards the west side of the plot as per Vastu guidelines to maintain privacy yet accessibility.

openings.description: main entrance door aligned on the east side for positive energy flow.
balcony window in master bedroom for ventilation and view.
dedicated access point to private gym located adjacent to ground floor, designed with secure entry and minimal disturbance to living spaces.

level_details.structure: Mediterranean architecture with red-tiled roof, warm stone facades, and courtyard gardens; irregular plot optimized by aligning longer dimension along the east-west axis.
level_details.Vastu_considerations: Entrance on east, key functional areas oriented to promote balance; west-facing aspects mitigated by proper landscaping.
